CustomField.description:
Filter that should be used for aggregate type of actions. Filter consists of field API name, operator and value. Supported comparison operators: <=, >=, <, >, =, != Supported logical operators between filter statements: ||, && Value is always without quotes as all values are treated as a string.
Example: Impressions_Quantity__c > 0 && Name = Bundle Print
CustomField.inlineHelpText:
Filter statement consists of field API name, operator and value. Comparison operators: <=, >=, <, >, =, != Logical operators between filter statements: ||, && Value: without quotes
Example: Impressions_Quantity__c > 0 && Name = Bundle Print
CustomField.label: Filter
